short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A temporary bookmark to save short term web interests. Keeps bookmarks for 30 days.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps keep the bookmarks folders clean from old and irrelevant links. Helps to keep the browser free of tab clutter. Provides a quick way to view recent bookmarks as well.
